reviews.content: If I could go Negative I would.  The staff and doctor have absolutely no professionalism.  My wife was brought in for a for my monthly appt.  1 day after her pain meds ran out, upon coming in they preformed a ORAL drug test.  Not a big deal, she was only taking my prescribed medicines.  Fast forward to 25 days later I received a certified letter stating that due to non compliance of medication she was being kicked to the curb.  The reasoning is that they didn't detect the Morphine in her system 15 hours after her last dose.  According to every medical site I visited morphine will only show for 4-6 hours after your last dose on a ORAL drug test.  If a doctor or their staff doesn't know the limits of their testing methods but have 0 concern for the patient then they don't deserve anything higher then a 1 Star
